A

add(BluetoothGattService) - Method in class com.welie.blessed.BluetoothPeripheralManager
Add a service to the peripheral
AdvertiseError - Enum in com.welie.blessed
This enum describes all possible errors that can occur when trying to start advertising
ADVERTISING_TIMEOUT - com.welie.blessed.HciStatus
Advertising for a fixed duration completed or, for directed advertising, that advertising completed without a connection being created.
ALREADY_STARTED - com.welie.blessed.AdvertiseError
Failed to start advertising as the advertising is already started.
ALREADY_STARTED - com.welie.blessed.ScanFailure
Failed to start scan as BLE scan with the same settings is already started by the app.
APPLICATION_REGISTRATION_FAILED - com.welie.blessed.ScanFailure
Failed to start scan as app cannot be registered.
ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND - com.welie.blessed.GattStatus
No attribute found within the given attribute handle range.
ATTRIBUTE_NOT_LONG - com.welie.blessed.GattStatus
The attribute cannot be read using the ATT_READ_BLOB_REQ PDU.
AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE - com.welie.blessed.HciStatus
Pairing or authentication failed due to incorrect results in the pairing or authentication procedure.
AUTHORIZATION_FAILED - com.welie.blessed.GattStatus
Authorization failed, typically because bonding failed
autoConnectPeripheral(BluetoothPeripheral, BluetoothPeripheralCallback) - Method in class com.welie.blessed.BluetoothCentralManager
Automatically connect to a peripheral when it is advertising.
autoConnectPeripheralsBatch(Map<BluetoothPeripheral, BluetoothPeripheralCallback>) - Method in class com.welie.blessed.BluetoothCentralManager
Autoconnect to a batch of peripherals.
